title: Cleric
content: Charm a humanoid to prevent in from attacking you. You gain Advantage on Charisma Checks in dialogue and prevent it from attacking. Enemies have Advantage on Saving Throws against being Charmed. When the spell ends, the target might accuse you of Charming them.10 TurnsCondition ends early if you or an ally hurts the targets.In higher difficulty modes, the target might accuse you of enchanting them.18m/60ft WIS Save Command (Halt) Lv 1 Enchantment Action Command a creature to flee, move closer,
